channel.title: Really stuck on this on
channel.description: When i begin playing moparscape, it works out fine in the beggining when im trying to log in but then it gets freaky by the letters going to the side and after a while going to otherservers the screen goes black and says to do the foloing in order. I did reinstall my java and tried everything but i cant play still. I read the faq or w/e its called and that didnt help at all. Someone help me >.>

item.description:
@Shift wrote:

hasumon:

Am i suppose to download moparscape? cause i only go to other peoples servers as a clienent.

Yeah it might work better if you did, other clients don’t always work correctly :rolleyes:

item.title: Really stuck on this on
item.dc:creator: @Shift Shift
item.description:
@Shift wrote:

hasumon:

Note: Im a complete begginer here so idont know what yur talking about :|[br][size=1]Posted on: June 26, 2007, 11:11:36 AM[/size][hr]My main drive is C w/e that means[br][size=1]Posted on: June 26, 2007, 11:14:35 AM[/size][hr] anyone???

Well, I dunno what to say. The only thing I could think would be wrong was if you had a random drive letter besides C, E, F etc. Because the client doesn’t have support for that.

Maybe try going to c:\windows and find the folder named ‘.mopar’ or something like that and deleting it. Maybe the cache didn’t finish downloading?

Read full topic

item.title: Really stuck on this on
item.dc:creator: @mod_jelle mod jelle
item.description:
@mod_jelle wrote:

can u be a more specific?
if u got a blackscreen there might be 3 reasons to fix:

  1. check if ur banned and if so, remove your name.
  2. change the starting coords.
  3. change your character coords(change the place where you are standing atm.)

i hope it helps.

Read full topic
